{"code":401,"indent":1,"parameters":["One, disobedience will not be tolerated. Clean and maintain the household as ordered."]}
{"code":401,"indent":1,"parameters":["Two, do not comment on Madame Yterre's appearance or, especially, her height."]}
{"code":401,"indent":1,"parameters":["She is a Dwarf from the northern lands. Rare here, yes, but that is simply their nature. Mistress is 35 years young."]}
{"code":401,"indent":1,"parameters":["Three, do not get in Madame Yterre's way."]}

{"code":401,"indent":1,"parameters":["\\!
You are here to clean first and foremost. She does not appreciate interruptions."]}
{"code":401,"indent":1,"parameters":["I'll be keeping an eye on you, but do not worry - I am quite lenient."]}

{"code":401,"indent":1,"parameters":["\\!
Well, lenient in comparison to Mistress, at least."]}
{"code":401,"indent":1,"parameters":["Very good. Now, off to work with you."]}

{"code":401,"indent":1,"parameters":["\\!
If you'd like a place to start, the second-floor gallery is in need of maintenance."]}
